Name: Magic vs Zombies
About the game: Top-down perspective. Apocalyptic open world. 7 types of zombies. Mortal mechanics to dodge zombie spells. Zombie Drops: Health, Power and amount of shots. As you level up, gain new spells and get stronger. Leveling up heals you by 100%. Max level 400.
